actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide reduced rates for non-profit senior citizens organizations.

summary.text: Entitles a qualified nonprofit organization of senior citizens to the reduced postal rates for third-class mail currently in effect for the mail matter of qualified nonprofit organizations.

titles.title: A bill to provide reduced rates for non-profit senior citizens organizations.
